entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 2:36AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels and Local Runoff Possible... Warming temperatures across the region later this week, combined with a much above normal snowpack over higher elevations, is/will cause a significant increase in snowmelt. Runoff into rivers south of the Brooks Range is causing water levels to rise and breakup to begin on some rivers. Local ice jams may form and result in
